experiences.title: Secure AI Chatbot Project
experiences.subtitle: Academic Project
workDescription: Developed a secure web-based conversational agent using **Python** and **Flask**, integrated with a **Large Language Model** for real-time responses.
Implemented **bcrypt password hashing**, session management, REST APIs, and **SQLite** database integration for secure user authentication.

experiences.title: Book Nest Web Application
